Body.Content:
The new Copilot for Microsoft 365 will be available in the Teams iOS and Android App for Copilot licensed users. This update will bring the Copilot app into the Teams Chat List on mobile for easy discovery and access. 

This message is associated with Microsoft 365 Roadmap ID 382800

When this will happen:

This update will roll out to our commercial tenants in early March 2024 and expect to compete by mid-March 2024.

How this will affect your organization:

All users with the Copilot license and using the new Teams app will see the Copilot app at the top of their Chat list for easy discovery and access.

What you need to do to prepare:

You may need to notify your users about this change and let them know this is the latest Copilot app. They can continue to use it as before.
